cause.description:
Meredith Harding is a simple girl with a simple dream. She wants to go to my house to party with the CTY China reunion that is taking place only 2 weeks after it ended. But who are we to deny her. Join us by chipping into the "Get Meredith's butt around the country" fund. Bottom line is, WE NEED TO PAY FOR MEREDITH'S TICKET,...... FUCK!!. Reach out and touch someone today (but not in that creepy child molestation way).
Oh yea, as of now the ideal time for this is like August 12th.
P.S. Don't actually donate you idiots, we just need to collaborate....
1. Meredith's apperance at the party is crucial for the soul of the reunion.
cause.mission: Drag Meredith's ass all the way to New York
cause.name: Get Meredith's butt across the country
